title: 'Black Mirror' season 8 announced for Netflix, with creator Charlie Brooker back at the helm
description: 'Luckily it does have a future, so I can confirm that 'Black Mirror' will return, just in time for reality to catch up with it.'
content: 'Luckily it does have a future, so I can confirm that 'Black Mirror' will return, just in time for reality to catch up with it.'
